amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 391 the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 113-23 shall be considered as adopted.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.

reference.label: text of amendment in the nature of a substitute

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
